short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change colors of h1-h6 and p tags from popup
short.vi: Thay đổi màu của thẻ h1-h6 và p từ cửa sổ bật lên

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension application "Color Changer - Joker Gift Card" is a great tool that allows you to quickly and easily change the color of text elements on a web page.
Main function:
Change the color of text tags (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p) on the website.
Provides a simple and intuitive user interface with color options through a convenient color palette.
Quick color settings are just a click away via the "Apply" button.
Automatically applies selected colors to open web pages without reloading.
This extension requires the following permissions to operate:
Access the activities tab.
Permission to use scripts to execute JavaScript code.
Access all URLs to change colors on any website.

Contact for application suggestions at Joker Gift Card where balance is checked:
- Address: 150 Canada St, Moncton, Canada
- Email: marco11599713@gmail.com
